title: Airport Closure and Emergency Response
text: The airport is currently closed due to a plane crash on runway 2-3. Emergency services are responding. Some arriving flights may be diverted, and departures will be delayed. Expect updates regarding airport reopening and possible itinerary changes.  Travelers should remain in designated areas and follow airport staff instructions. A plane coming in to help after being granted permission to land is reporting that the upside down airplane is on fire.

title: Potential Gear-Up Landing
text: The control tower is communicating with an aircraft, 40 Delta, experiencing potential issues with its landing gear. The pilot initially performed a "go-around," aborting their landing attempt. They are assessing the situation to determine if the gear is functioning correctly. Passengers may experience delays as the runway may need to be inspected. The aircraft successfully landed and is having its landing inspected. Expect further delays if something is wrong.

title: Aircraft Emergency Landing
text: A UPS cargo plane reported a possible fire in a cargo area. The plane is returning to the airport for an emergency landing. Emergency vehicles are being moved into position. Expect possible delays as priority is given to the landing aircraft.
